entry.title: improving development model (Re: Concerns Regarding Threats by a Developer to Remove Commit Access from Other Developers
entry.summary: Dr. Adam Back discusses the payment protocol layer in Bitcoin and elaborates on his argument in a YouTube video. He provides a transcript of the video for those who prefer to consume text instead.
